settings_subtitle: Personalize your workspace, interface theme, and regional preferences.
settings_notifications_subtitle: Control how and when the system contacts you.
settings_notifications_email_appointment: Receive an email when a patient books an appointment.
settings_notifications_email_labs_desc: Get notified when critical lab results are finalized.
settings_notifications_push_shifts_desc: Remind me 1 hour before my shift starts.
settings_toast_password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters.
settings_appearance_accent_desc: Personalize the primary highlight color across the system.
settings_appearance_density_desc: Adjust the spacing between UI elements for your screen size.
settings_appearance_font_desc: Scale the global text size for better readability.
dashboard_feed_empty_subtext: No pending tasks requiring immediate action.
patients_subtitle: Manage patient records, admissions, and medical history.
patients_search_placeholder: Search by name, ID or phone...
patients_table_empty: No patients found matching your criteria.

patients_modal_action_deposit_note: Minimum deposit calculated based on estimated stay.
patients_modal_action_clinical_request_d: Surgical procedures require detailed medical justification and pre-op clearance.
patients_modal_action_op_note: This request will be sent to the Operations management screen for detailed costing and team assignment.
patients_process_success_operation: Operation requested. Proceed to Operations for final costing.
patients_process_success_appointment: Appointment scheduled. Confirm in Appointments screen.
patients_process_success_lab: Lab request created. Confirm in Laboratory for billing.
appointments_subtitle: Manage daily patient flow and staff assignments.
appointments_cancel_dialog_message: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?
admissions_subtitle: Overview of bed occupancy and patient management.
admissions_modal_reserve_note: This will reserve bed {room} for the patient. A deposit bill will be created.
admissions_care_discharge_note: Discharging calculates the final bill and frees the bed after cleaning.
admissions_confirm_message: Patient {patient} has a paid reservation. Confirm to admit the patient and mark the bed as occupied.
admissions_modal_confirm_subtitle: The deposit for this reservation has not been paid.
admissions_modal_confirm_message: To activate this admission, please process the payment in the Billing section.
admissions_dialog_discharge_message: Are you sure you want to discharge this patient? This will finalize their stay and mark the bed for cleaning.
admissions_modal_reserve_payment_error: Admission cannot be confirmed until deposit is paid in full.
admissions_care_no_bills: No outstanding bills for this stay.
admissions_report_subtitle: Comprehensive summary of stay, clinical notes, and discharge details.
admissions_report_blocked_msg: Outstanding balance: ${balance}. Please settle bills to proceed.
admissions_report_final_note_placeholder: Summary of treatment, medication, and follow-up instructions...
admissions_dialog_clean_msg: Is the room sanitized and ready for the next patient?
lab_modal_remarks_placeholder: Add summarizing observations or critical flags for the clinical team...

settings_notifications_push_shifts_desc: ذكرني قبل ساعة من بدء مناوبتي.

patients_modal_action_deposit_note: الحد الأدنى محسوب بناءً على الإقامة المقدرة.
patients_modal_action_clinical_request_d: تتطلب الإجراءات الجراحية تبريرًا طبيًا مفصلاً وتصريحًا ما قبل الجراحة.
patients_modal_action_op_note: سيتم إرسال الطلب إلى شاشة إدارة العمليات لتقدير التكلفة التفصيلية وتعيين الفريق.
patients_process_success_admission: تم حجز السرير. تم إنشاء فاتورة العربون.
patients_process_success_operation: تم طلب العملية. انتقل إلى قسم العمليات للتسعير النهائي.
patients_process_success_appointment: تمت جدولة الموعد. قم بالتأكيد في شاشة المواعيد.
patients_process_success_lab: تم إنشاء طلب المختبر. قم بالتأكيد في المختبر للفوترة.
appointments_subtitle: إدارة تدفق المرضى اليومي وتعيينات الموظفين.

admissions_care_no_notes: لم يتم تسجيل أي ملاحظات سريرية بعد.
admissions_care_discharge_note: سيؤدي التخريج إلى حساب مبلغ الفاتورة النهائي وإتاحة السرير بعد التنظيف.
admissions_confirm_message: المريض {patient} لديه حجز مدفوع. قم بالتأكيد لتنويم المريض وتغيير حالة السرير إلى مشغول.
admissions_modal_confirm_subtitle: لم يتم دفع عربون هذا الحجز.

admissions_dialog_discharge_message: هل أنت متأكد من رغبتك في تخريج هذا المريض؟ سيتم إنهاء إقامته وتحديد السرير للتنظيف.
